content:
I have:
- modified the statement a little,
- fixed the stub,
- added fastest mode.

I still have issues with the fact that the validators are not equivalent to their corresponding tests.

But it is overall a nice CoC.

Already two approvals, but nobody to fix the validators. Congrats!

edit: fortunately, no third approval has arrived while I was fixing the validators.
may I know which case is wrong? I'd like to fix that asap Thx a lot for the contribution!!

It is not an issue with the results, but with the ordering of your test cases.

The rule is that all test cases shall came in pairs: one test + one validator. People will only see the tests, and the code submitted will be checked against the validators. Therefore, it is important that each validator is similar to its corresponding test.

Oh I am new to codingame so I didn't know the rule...
I will fix it right away Thx!!
The puzzle is now in a good shape. But you are welcome to add other pairs of tests/validators. There is still room for improvement on this point. :)
